name: LL-37
overview: A human antimicrobial peptide naturally produced by the body as part of the innate immune response. Research has explored its antimicrobial properties and potential role in wound healing and immune modulation.
interactions_notes: Very limited interaction data. May affect immune responses and inflammation. Discuss all medications with clinician, especially antibiotics and immune-modulating drugs.
dosing_ranges_literature: Human clinical data is extremely limited. Preclinical research has explored a wide range of concentrations. Standardized dosing protocols have not been established.
storage_notes: Store unreconstituted peptide in freezer (-20Â°C or colder). After reconstitution, store refrigerated and use within 1-2 weeks. Sensitive to degradation.
